attributes.action: We must remain in the EU. MPs should not support Article 50 being set in motion.
attributes.additional_details:
Some voters may have been misled by what has subsequently been proven to have been disinformation. We have seen the immediate aftermath and chaos these last few days.

We can stop this.

Parliament must vote:
- to reject the results of the EU Referendum
- block any legislation that transitions the UK out of the EU
- prevent invocation of Article 50

No decision of this magnitude should be taken on the basis of such disinformation and without a clear majority.

We are not leaving.
attributes.background: The EU Referendum is an advisory one only. We call on MPs to reject the results of the referendum and stop any active steps towards severance with the EU. We demand that Article 50 of the Lisbon treaty is not invoked. We must maintain our place in the EU.
